text: The processor shall implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk. GDPR compliance requires data minimization and user rights.
Data subjects have the right to erasure (right to be forgotten) under GDPR Article 17. The contract provides a process for handling deletion requests within 30 days.
Confidentiality clause: Parties agree not to disclose trade secrets. This clause is not directly related to GDPR compliance.
Encryption in transit (TLS 1.2+) and at rest (AES-256) are mandated by the vendor policy. Incident response time is 72 hours.
The California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) grants disclosure and deletion rights similar to GDPR but differs in scope and definitions.
